archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Prairie du Chien Canning Factory (Wisconsin) Day Book 1897-1898
did.abstract: The canning factory day book contains lists of accounts of people and businesses who bought canned goods. The factory is located in Prairie Du Chien, Wisconsin. Lists expenses the factory incurred with other businesses. Business associates include Furniture and Fixture Co, Standard Oil Co., Wooster Preserving Co., Nave and McCord Mer. Co., and Heinz Co.
did.origination: Prairie Du Chien Canning Factory, Wisconsin arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collection Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not by Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Prairie du Chien Canning Factory (Wisconsin) Day Book, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 00/00/2008.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Canning Factory in Prairie Du Chien, Wisconsin. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Prairie Du Chien Canning Factory, Wisconsin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The canning factory day book contains lists of accounts of people and businesses who bought canned goods. The factory is located in Prairie Du Chien, Wisconsin. Lists expenses the factory incurred with other businesses. Business associates include Furniture and Fixture Co, Standard Oil Co., Wooster Preserving Co., Nave and McCord Mer. Co., and Heinz Co.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
